snippet: Walmart said it would spend $290 million to buy and renovate the stores, creating 1,500 construction jobs.
abstract: Walmart says it will spend $290 million to buy and renovate 13 former Target stores and one former distribution center in Canada, and hired 3,400 new employees.
lead_paragraph: Walmart said it would spend $290 million to buy and renovate the stores, creating 1,500 construction jobs.

headline.print_headline: Walmart to Buy 13 Former Target Stores In Canada
headline.main: Walmart to Buy 13 Former Target Stores in Canada
